casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Karen Elaine EVERETT. No. 350A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 10, 2006. Amos Granger Tyndall, Chapel Hill, for Everett. C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 630 S.E.2d 703 .

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of July 2006 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of July 2006."
